SurfaceValueObject.text: Not all love is ethical. Like you should never go after your friend's partner.
Love is a commitment and true love is rare. This shape doesn't even seem sad after they lost their partner, it's disrepectful to the sanctity of partnership.
You have to look hard if you want to find the one for you. This shape tries really hard to get themself out there, they are really true to their heart.
Love isn't everything! This shape abandoned their partner for another shape, love can be cruel.
If you always follow your heart, you will end up like this shape who has zero sense of duty or responsibility.
If you know the right shape, love can be great thing! Like this shape who found their partener so early.
We shouldn't always follow our heart. This shape has been in mutiple partnerships and never thought through the consequences.
Love is deeper than we think. This shape entered a parternship not for love but found love eventually in their family life.
Love can make smart shape do stupid things! Like this shape who went after a shape they shouldn't be with.
You know, this shape is a great representative of why family is important. They have a wonderful family life and they look really happy.
This shape is leeching off their family and not working, of course they are a family shape.
This shape also works with their family! What a fulfilling life!
Well in the case of family business, family can be an agent of nepotism. Like this shape who's hired by their family, would you trust them to work for you?
This shape had many families. I don't thinking being a family shape means they are a good and responsible shape.
This shape knows the importance of family and I am sure they have found bliss in their new family.
Family is a stablizing agent, this shape is so down to earth and you can tell from their stable family life.
Well in the case of family business, family can be an agent of nepotism. Like this shape who's hired by their family, would you trust them to work for you?
Your home is where your friends and family are, this shape has never left the city but they have a rich social life.
This shape has stayed close to their roots and has been taking care of their family. That's really honorable.
There's nothing wrong with being alone while you explore the world, maybe you will find youself just like how this shape did.
This shape stayed in this city becasue their best friend is here, wouldn't you say that true friendship?
This shape works with their family in the city and that's a wonderful thing.
Like this shape who has support of their family and didn't even have to look for a job, that's what a good support system looks like.
This shape needs to find a move to a space where they can thrive, there is nothing wrong with that.
Shapes must find where they belong and I am sure they will find where they turly belong by visiting different places.
Our city is great, you can tell by how many shapes want to move here!
We have a tradition that must be honored and protected, you can only do that when you are at home.
This shape has always been a stable element of the community, they are respected by all becasue they understand how improtant home is.
If you're going to fall in love with your friend's partner like this shape did, you should probably stay alone.
This shape has a rich social life and that's wonderful!
This shape makes a lot of enemies becasue they always try to make friends.
This shape has no loyalty and you don't want a friend like that.
This shape likes to keep to themselve and there is nothing wrong with that.
This shape is always hanging out with their best friend and don't you envy a friendship like that?
This shape travels a lot and it's hard to make friends. But there is nothing wrong with that.
This shape likes to keep to themselve. But there is nothing wrong with that.
This shape doesn't want to make a lot of  friends and I respect their choices.
You can't trust everyone. This shape is too trusting and friendly, they will get into trouble one day.
This shape select their friends very carefully and we should all be like that.
This shape is too friendly with their friend's partner. Being social just cause trouble.
Look how happy this shape is! Shapes who have a lot of friends must be good shapes.
This shape made a lot of enemies and I don't think being social is such a good idea.
This shape befriended their friend 's enemy. How could anyone trust a shape like that.
This shape makes friends just becasue they want to take advantage of them. I feel like overly social shapes all have something to hide.
This shape and their best friend support each other no matter what, don't you want something that special?!
This shape flirts with everyone even though they are commited, I don't think being social helps them.
This shape moves a lot and being social helps to make new places easier to adjust.
This shape is too social when they should focus that energy on their partner.
This shape trusts everyone and that's very stupid of them. Being social isn't the best thing for us.
This shape likes to keep to themselves and that's their right to do so. I respect that.
This shape chooses their friends very carefully and that's a wise decision.
This shape makes a lot of enemies becasue they always try to make friends.
This shape has a rich social life and that's wonderful!
This shape has no loyalty and you don't want a friend like that.
This shape likes to keep to themselve and there is nothing wrong with that.
This shape is always hanging out with their best friend and don't you envy a friendship like that?
This shape travels a lot and it's hard to make friends. But there is nothing wrong with that.
This shape moves a lot and being social helps to make new places easier to adjust.
This shape likes to keep to themselve. But there is nothing wrong with that.
You can't trust everyone. This shape is too trusting and friendly, they will get into trouble one day.
This shape doesn't want to make a lot of  friends and I respect their choices.
This shape select their friends very carefully and we should all be like that.
This shape gave in to their temporary attraction to their friend's partner, what we can learn from that is spontaneity can make logical shapes do stupid things.
This shape made a lot of enemies becasue they are careless and never think before they do anything. That's what you get when you live for spontaneity.
If you never go with your feelings, how would you know you met the right shape! Look how active this shape is and I am sure they will find the right one soon.
This shape left their partner for someone else, spontaneity can cause a lot of pain.
This shape is in love with someone other than their partner, I don't think being spontaneous helps in that situation.
This shape started family young because they were not careful. You do not want to end up like that.
This shape moves a lot and has no sense of belonging, I think that's what you get for being spontaneous all the time.
This shape always keeps to themselves and moves around a lot, being spontaneous make you a unreliable shape.
This shape knows the importance of doing the right thing for their family and for themselves.
It's immoral to go after shapes that are not right for you. This shape is so impulsive and they will get themselve in trouble one day soon.
When adventure comes your way, you must say yes! Like this shape who's been everywhere! What a life.
Being spontaneous can be dangerous, this shape is so trusting and the world is not kind.
The world is so big and if you are spontaneous, you can see what life has to offer.
This shape never stayed in one job long enough to see if they truly like it, being spontaneous is just a lazy shape's excuse.
You have to take some risks to make your dreams come true. If you do that, you can be a successful shape like that.
This shape has been promoted so many times because they stayed at their job and worked hard, you can't be someone like that if you chase anything that flys by.
This shape has been promoted so many times because they stayed at their job and worked hard, you can't be someone like that if you chase anything that flys by.
This shape is a thrill seeker and I am pretty sure that's why they fell in love with their spouse's friend.
This shape made a lot of enemies becasue they are reckless. Some would call that adventurous but I don't see it that way.
This shape will get themselves in trouble one day if they keeps on dating half of the city.
This shape is a thrill seeker and I am pretty sure that's why they found love with somone they shouldn't be.
There's no stability in seeking adventures, look at this shape who doesn't know their roots.
This shape retired early and now they can go on adventures and enjoy life!
This shape is just selfish. Love is not an adventure, it's a responsibility.
This shape has no moral boundaries and I'm sure one day they will make a huge mistake.
This shape has seen so many things and been to so many places, that's really what living is all about.
This shape trusts everyone and that naivete will be a problem when they go on adventures.
You can only see the world if you go out there and see what the world has ro offer! Be more like this shape who's always discovering new things.
This shape keeps switchin jobs because they want adventures. This is not a stable way of living.
But you have to take risks if you want to go far in life! Look at this shape and how much they have accomplished.
Well, this shape took risks and that's why they got promoted.
Love can be immoral sometimes. This shape went after their friend's partner, that's just wrong.
Commitment is more important than love. This shape doesn't even seem sad after they lost their partner, it's disrepectful to the sanctity of partnership.
This shape is really brave because they tried really hard to get themself out there, you can say that foolish but I think they are brave.
Love can be cruel. Like this shape who abandoned their partner for another shape.
Love make you foolish, this shape is not loyal to their partner and that makes them a fool.
Love can be great thing when you find the right shape! This shape was able to find someone early and look how happy they are.
This shape has ended mutiple partnerships and I think they will never find the right one. They are too weak and foolish.
This shape entered a parternship not for love but found love eventually in their family life. Happiness of the family is more important than selfish love.
Love can make smart shape stupid. Like this shape who went after a shape they shouldn't be with.
I heard this shape is in love with their friend's partner! That's so werild.
Well, I heard this shape has many enemies. I feel like this speaks to their character. How can you trust someone like that.
Sometimes, you have to make friends with people others don't like. I don't think that's weird at all.
Well, instead of explotetative, you could say that this shape is smart for looking out for themself.
This shape seems very happy that their parterner is dead. How weird is that!
I would never put my trust in a shape who leeches off their family.
Well, this shape seems to be doing fine even though they don't have a job. So who cares.
This shape always keeps to themself. I just can't trust someone like that.
This shape is weak because they are betraying their partner's trust.
This shape moves way too much and who knows what they are hiding!
This shape can't hold a job, I know exactly what kind of shape they are.
I heard this shape is always on the run... I wonder why that is.
This shape must be very disciplined to be able to retire young, I don't think that makes them a werid shape.
This shape can't keep a relationship. I don't want to be near someone like that.
This shape has a good heart and they make the world a better place.
This shape seems to be a good shape who sticks to all the rules so I don't know what you are talking about.
Nepotism is not that bad becasue you have to protect those you really care about.
This shape can't make up their mind about what they want to do in life. I just don't understand that.
